test.name: Teste case 01 - Successful contact via the menu

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: And I enter "Contact Us" via the menu
Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: When I fill contact us form with "${VALID_EMAIL}" and "${ORDER_REF}" and "${MESSAGE}"
kw.sourcename: I fill contact us form with "${VALID_EMAIL}" and "${ORDER_REF}" and "${MESSAGE}"

kw.name: Select From List By Index
kw.doc: Selects options from selection list ``locator`` by ``indexes``.
kw.msg: Selecting options from selection list 'id=id_contact' by index 2.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Typing text 'This is a test message.' into text field 'id=message'.

kw.name: And I submit the contact us form
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Then I should have successfully sent the message
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Page Should Contain Element
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` is found on the current page.
kw.msg: Current page contains element '//p[contains(.,'Your message has been successfully sent to our team.')]'.

kw.name: Close All Browsers
kw.doc: Closes all open browsers and resets the browser cache.

test.name: Teste case 05 - no subject heading selected

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: And I enter "Contact Us" via the menu
Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: When I fill contact us form without subject heading
Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: And I submit the contact us form
